document_data.name: Winlof
document_data.mainbody:
'''Winlof''' was a [[doomguide]] who lived in the city of [[Neverwinter]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I'm hurt and scared and ashamed that I allowed my faith in [[Kelemvor]] to waver|Winlof, upon her rescue in the Wizard's Tomb.}}
document_data.History:
At some point around the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Winlof was assigned to the post at [[Neverwinter/Neverdeath|Neverdeath Graveyard]]. That year, she and some of her fellows became lost in the [[Pauper's Field]] area of the graveyard after being assaulted by the [[undead]] and their [[Red Wizard]] masters.

She was taken to a the tomb of an unnamed [[wizard]] and left in a fearful state of despair. Winlof was the first to be rescued by the [[adventurer]] working a senior member of her order [[Volahk|Doomguide Volahk]].
